name: Aam Ras Recipe | Zarnak Sidhwa | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Aam Ras Recipe: Ripe mango pulp 1 cup Caster sugar 2 tbsp Milk 1 cup Cardamom powder 1/2 tsp Saffron a pinch Kevra water 1 tsp Ice crushed as required
instructions: Mix the mango pulp, sugar, and milk, stir. Add the cardamom powder, saffron, and kevra water. Stir well, and add some ice cubes and serve in glasses.
